name: TheAtlantic
text: More than 30 wildfires are currently burning in the state of Oregon. Over the past week, dry weather and strong winds drove the flames into several towns and neighborhoods, leaving some communities utterly destroyed. Images via @theAtlPhoto:  https://t.co/KMLgZgnKF8 https://t.co/F54KQjoVwv
